languages.text: "Я бы немало отдала за то, чтобы принять участие в карательной экспедиции, Ваша Светлость, но мой долг — благополучие этой планеты, а не военные операции". {n}Голос Клеменции становится жестче, она буквально выплевывает:{/n} "Прошу вас, Вольный Торговец — заставьте их проклинать тот день, когда они решили напасть на Даргонус!"

"Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"
languages.original_text: "Я бы немало отдала за то, чтобы принять участие в карательной экспедиции, Ваша Светлость, но мой долг — благополучие этой планеты, а не военные операции". {n}Голос Клеменции становится жестче, она буквально выплевывает:{/n} "Прошу вас, Вольный Торговец — заставьте их проклинать тот день, когда они решили напасть на Даргонус!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is this planet's welfare, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

"Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is this planet's welfare, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

"Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

"Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

"Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

languages.text: 「ああ、その正義の遠征にご同行するためであればすべてを差し出します、陛下。しかし、私はこの惑星の福祉を担う身であり、軍事作戦には向きません」{n}クレメンティアの声はさらに厳しくなり、まるで吐き捨てるように言う。{/n}「私からのお願いです、自由開拓者様―ダルゴナスを襲撃したことを悔むよう、徹底的に潰してください！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、その正義の遠征にご同行するためであればすべてを差し出します、陛下。しかし、私はこの惑星の福祉を担う身であり、軍事作戦には向きません」{n}クレメンティアの声はさらに厳しくなり、まるで吐き捨てるように言う。{/n}「私からのお願いです、自由開拓者様―ダルゴナスを襲撃したことを悔むよう、徹底的に潰してください！」

languages.text: “噢，我真的愿意放弃一切，加入您的复仇行动，大人。只可惜，我的任务是造福行星的人民，并不是参与军事行动。”{n}克莱门缇雅越说越激动，几乎是咬牙切齿地吐出最后一句话。{/n}“我请求您，行商浪人——务必要让他们为袭击达戈努斯的决定悔恨终身！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，我真的愿意放弃一切，加入您的复仇行动，大人。只可惜，我的任务是造福行星的人民，并不是参与军事行动。”{n}克莱门缇雅越说越激动，几乎是咬牙切齿地吐出最后一句话。{/n}“我请求您，行商浪人——务必要让他们为袭击达戈努斯的决定悔恨终身！”

languages.text: «Me encantaría poder participar en la expedición de castigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me corresponde atender al bienestar del planeta y no a las operaciones militares». {n}La voz de Clementia se vuelve más severa y prácticamente escupe:{/n} «Se lo ruego, Comerciante Independiente: ¡haga que lamenten el día en el que atacaron Dargonus!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: «Me encantaría poder participar en la expedición de castigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me corresponde atender al bienestar del planeta y no a las operaciones militares». {n}La voz de Clementia se vuelve más severa y prácticamente escupe:{/n} «Se lo ruego, Comerciante Independiente: ¡haga que lamenten el día en el que atacaron Dargonus!».

languages.text: « Oh, je donnerais tout pour me joindre à l'expédition punitive, Votre Seigneurie. Malheureusement, mon devoir concerne avant tout le bien-être de cette planète, et je dois donc m'écarter des opérations militaires. » {n}Son ton se durcit et elle s'exclame :{/n}« Je vous en supplie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} : faites-leur regretter d'avoir osé attaquer Dargonus ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je donnerais tout pour me joindre à l'expédition punitive, Votre Seigneurie. Malheureusement, mon devoir concerne avant tout le bien-être de cette planète, et je dois donc m'écarter des opérations militaires. » {n}Son ton se durcit et elle s'exclame :{/n}« Je vous en supplie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} : faites-leur regretter d'avoir osé attaquer Dargonus ! »

languages.text: "Oh, ich würde viel dafür geben, bei der Strafexpedition dabei zu sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber meine Pflicht ist das Wohlbefinden dieses Planeten, keine Militäroperationen." {n}Clementias Stimme wird strenger, und sie spuckt die Worte förmlich aus:{/n} "Ich bitte Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}– lasst sie den Tag verfluchen, an dem sie beschlossen haben, Dargonus zu überfallen!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ich würde viel dafür geben, bei der Strafexpedition dabei zu sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber meine Pflicht ist das Wohlbefinden dieses Planeten, keine Militäroperationen." {n}Clementias Stimme wird strenger, und sie spuckt die Worte förmlich aus:{/n} "Ich bitte Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}– lasst sie den Tag verfluchen, an dem sie beschlossen haben, Dargonus zu überfallen!"

languages.text: "Bu kutlu sefere katılmak için neler vermezdim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Fakat benim görevim; sefere çıkmak değil, bu gezegene hizmet etmektir." {n}Clementia, gitgide sertleşen sesiyle konuşmayı sürdürüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, sizden tek bir dileğim var. Dargonus'a saldırmaya cüret ettikleri güne pişman edin onları!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what I wouldn't give to join the punitive expedition, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but my duty is to the welfare of this planet, not military operations." {n}Clementia's voice grows sterner, and she practically spits out,{/n} "This is my plea to you, Rogue Trader — make them rue the day that they decided to assault Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kutlu sefere katılmak için neleri vermezdim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Fakat benim görevim bu gezegene hizmet etmektir, sefere çıkmak değil." {n}Clementia'nın sesi gitgide sertleşiyor, ardından sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Hür Tüccar, sizden tek bir dileğim var. Dargonus'a saldırmaya cüret ettikleri güne pişman edin onları!"
